title: Designing a Modern Nursing Education Framework for Enhancing Practical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental nursing theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Training for practicing nurses involving project-based tasks that reflect the complexity of real clinical environments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze practice standards based on AACN Essentials and NCSBN CJMM and integrate them into instructional design
Learners can develop tools to assess psychological capital (decision-making skills, self-efficacy) by applying the ADD-SEM model.
Learners can design and implement an educational framework considering patient safety, job retention, and practical readiness in a PBL environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
